item.title: Accessibility Self-Paced Training from University of Washington
item.description: Accessibility Self-Paced Training https://canvas.uw.edu/courses/1351896 This self-paced, fully online course is available publicly to provide an opportunity for the everyone to learn more about accessibility, creating accessible content, and being an advocate.
